posts.title: Building RESTful APIs
posts.content: REST (Representational State Transfer) is an architectural style for designing networked applications. This guide covers the core principles of REST and demonstrates how to build a clean RESTful API using modern tools and best practices.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: Introduction to React Hooks
posts.content: React Hooks revolutionized how we write React components by enabling the use of state and other React features without writing classes. This tutorial explores the most common hooks like useState, useEffect, and useContext, with practical examples.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
posts.content: Modern CSS layouts often use either Grid or Flexbox. While they share some similarities, they're designed for different use cases. Grid is best for two-dimensional layouts, while Flexbox excels at one-dimensional arrangements. This post compares their strengths and when to use each.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: Express.js Best Practices
posts.content: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications. In this article, we'll cover some best practices for structuring your Express applications and handling common patterns.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: Getting Started with TypeScript
posts.content: TypeScript is a powerful superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and other features to enhance developer productivity. In this post, we'll explore the basics of setting up a TypeScript project and some key features that make it worth learning.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: Why I Love Coding
posts.content: Coding allows me to create amazing things and solve complex problems. In this post, I share my journey into programming.
posts.author: Noel

posts.title: Welcome to My Blog
posts.content: This is the first post on my blog. Stay tuned for more updates!
posts.author: Noel
